doc:
Isabelle Sadoyan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Isabelle_Sadoyan 0 Isabelle Sadoyan (12 May 1928 – 10 July 2017) was a French-Armenian actress. She was the wife of actor Jean Bouise. Her filmography includes films by Jeanne Moreau, Claude Chabrol, Claude Lelouch, Luc Besson, Jean-Luc Godard, Henri Verneuil, Bertrand Tavernier, Robert Kechichian and Krzysztof Kieślowski. Isabelle_Sadoyan ( 12_May_1928 – 10_July_2017 ) was a_French-Armenian_actress . She was the_wife of actor_Jean_Bouise . Her_filmography includes films by Jeanne_Moreau , Claude_Chabrol , Claude_Lelouch , Luc_Besson , Jean-Luc_Godard , Henri_Verneuil , Bertrand_Tavernier , Robert_Kechichian and Krzysztof_Kieślowski .
